name: Ss share
author: shifu

sections.description:
Super light plugin for viral social media sharing!
1. Minimum code.
2. Minimum requests to the DataBase.
3. High performance.
4. No external script including.
5. All icons in svg.
6. Simple user interface.

sections.installation:
1. Upload ss-share to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Super simple social share buttons plugin. Most popular social media platforms: facebook, twitter, reddit, linkedin, pinterest, tumblr.
